name: Biomachinery
tag: Machinery integrated on a cellular level

quote.text: I loved my chosen. How then to face the day when she left me? So I took her from her body a single cell, perhaps to love her again

description: Early experiments in Retroviral Engineering (C5) and the Mind/Machine Interface (C6) paved the way for true Biomachinery -- the full integration of man and machine at the cellular level.
